//Generated by BehavEd


affect ( "collapse_guy_a", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{
	set ( "SET_STATIONARY", "ON" );
	set ( "SET_SEARCH_OFF", "ON" );
	set ( "SET_RELEASE_ONCONTACT", "ON" );
	set ( "SET_ANIM_SEQUENCER", "OFF" );
	set ( "SET_ANIM_LOOP", "ON" );

	loop ( -1 )
	{

		task ( "fire" )
		{
			set ( "SET_ANIM", "Body|Script|Full+None+Normal+Stand|Shield face from fire" );
		}

		dowait ( "fire" );
	}

}
